mapper.select: SELECT non_drug_list.id as nid,item_code,item_name,format,price,expense_class_id,executivedepartment_id,mnemonic_code,item_type,creation_time,expense_name,department_name FROM non_drug_list LEFT JOIN expense_class on non_drug_list.expense_class_id = expense_class.id LEFT JOIN department on non_drug_list.executivedepartment_id = department.id
mapper.update:
UPDATE his.non_drug_list SET expense_class_id = (SELECT expense_class.id FROM expense_class WHERE expense_name = #{expenseClassName}),
executivedepartment_id = (SELECT department.id FROM his.department WHERE department_name = #{executivedepartmentName}), item_code = #{itemCode}, item_name = #{itemName}, format = #{format}, price = #{price}, mnemonic_code = #{mnemonicCode}, item_type = #{itemType}, creation_time = #{creationTime} where non_drug_list.id = #{id}
mapper.select: SELECT non_drug_list.id as nid,item_code,item_name,format,price,expense_class_id,executivedepartment_id,mnemonic_code,item_type,creation_time,expense_name,department_name FROM non_drug_list LEFT JOIN expense_class on non_drug_list.expense_class_id = expense_class.id LEFT JOIN department on non_drug_list.executivedepartment_id = department.id where ${attribute_name} like CONCAT('%','${attribute}','%')
mapper.sql: id, item_code, item_name, format, price, expense_class_id, executivedepartment_id, mnemonic_code, item_type, creation_time
mapper.select:
select
distinct
from non_drug_list
order by ${orderByClause}
mapper.insert:
SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID()

mapper.update:
update non_drug_list
id = #{record.id,jdbcType=INTEGER},
item_code = #{record.itemCode,jdbcType=CHAR},
item_name = #{record.itemName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
format = #{record.format,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
price = #{record.price,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
expense_class_id = #{record.expenseClassId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
executivedepartment_id = #{record.executivedepartmentId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
mnemonic_code = #{record.mnemonicCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
item_type = #{record.itemType,jdbcType=CHAR},
creation_time = #{record.creationTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},

update non_drug_list set id = #{record.id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, item_code = #{record.itemCode,jdbcType=CHAR}, item_name = #{record.itemName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, format = #{record.format,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, price = #{record.price,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, expense_class_id = #{record.expenseClassId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, executivedepartment_id = #{record.executivedepartmentId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, mnemonic_code = #{record.mnemonicCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, item_type = #{record.itemType,jdbcType=CHAR}, creation_time = #{record.creationTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}

update non_drug_list
item_code = #{itemCode,jdbcType=CHAR},
item_name = #{itemName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
format = #{format,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
price = #{price,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
expense_class_id = #{expenseClassId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
executivedepartment_id = #{executivedepartmentId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
mnemonic_code = #{mnemonicCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
item_type = #{itemType,jdbcType=CHAR},
creation_time = #{creationTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
